Instruction:
Task Description: Create a wrapper class for Kafka Producer to simplify message sending operations and resource management.

Class Description: The KafkaProducerWrapper class provides a convenient interface for interacting with a Kafka Producer, handling message sending, flushing, and proper resource cleanup. It encapsulates a KafkaProducer instance and delegates operations to it.

Attributes:
- producer: Producer<K, V> - The underlying Kafka Producer instance that handles actual message production

Methods:
- Constructor: KafkaProducerWrapper(Map<String, Object> configs, Serializer<K> keySerializer, Serializer<V> valueSerializer) -> void - Initializes the wrapper with Kafka configuration, key serializer, and value serializer
- send: send(ProducerRecord<K, V> record) -> Future<RecordMetadata> - Sends a message to Kafka without a callback
- send: send(ProducerRecord<K, V> record, Callback callback) -> Future<RecordMetadata> - Sends a message to Kafka with a callback
- flush: flush() -> void - Flushes any buffered messages
- close: close() -> void - Closes the producer immediately
- close: close(Duration timeout) -> void - Closes the producer with a specified timeout
